PAD_NervesReminder.synopsis: In combat: mind flayer, cambion and laezel are dead. Remind of reaching the nerves.

AD_GuideWarningBacktrack.synopsis: This AD oneliner is triggered when a player character is doubling back after having started the helm combat. The alternative gith guide (he exists when Laezel is an avatar) will warn players against going back and urge them to press on to the transponder.This line will be acompanied by some explosions and fire to represent the nautiloid going down and the urgency to reach the transponder to escape. If players continue to go back they will die.
AD_GuideWarningBacktrack.how_to_trigger: 1)Start TUT_Avernus_C with Laezel2) Call in ReCon oe TUT_LowerDeck_StartGuideDialog3)Finish the dialog to recruit Losiir4)Killcombat5)Teleport to -13; 18; -389 and interact with the helm door6)When combat starts, move back with a character that's not Losiir

AD_LaezelMindflayerFall.synopsis: The mind flayer has fallen in combat - player won't expect to fight it later. Lae'zel is releived, but the tension is still high as they try to escape from the Hells.

PAD_PlayerOutsideHelm.synopsis: Oneliner PAD for when a player is away from the helm while another player has started the helm cinematic. The line warns that the situation is getting worse and going to the helm is a priority. This line will be acompanied with a camera shake.

AD_LaezelIgnoreCambion.synopsis: Players attack cambion, Lae'zel reminds them to not waste time.

PAD_FirstWarning.synopsis: On the third turn of the helm fight, the player will comment on the ship heading for a crash.

AD_LaezelGoToHelmReminder.synopsis: Players backtrack from the helm towards the upper deck. Lae'zel tells them to go back.

Transponder.synopsis: Started by clicking on the transponder in the back of the helm. Allows players to connect cables to end the tutorial.

AD_MindFlayerIgnoreCambion.synopsis: Players attack cambion, Mind flayer reminds them to not waste time.

AD_AmbushDevil.synopsis: Leader of imps breaks through helm to attack mind flayer

AD_MindFlayerKillsPlayers.synopsis: Cambion dies and mind flayer is still alive. He will kill the players.

AD_ShadowheartGoToHelmReminder.synopsis: Shadowheart calls out to the player when they start moving away from their objective at the climax of the tutorial.

LaezelBeforeHelm.synopsis: Right before the scene at the helm where the player confronts the mind flayer and seizes the helm. If present, Shadowheart will speak up after Lae'zel issues instructions.

PAD_MindFlayerFall.synopsis: Player's comment about the mind flayer dying in battle with imps, if Lae'zel isn't there to do it.

AD_CambionTaunt_002.synopsis: Combat AD for backup cambion taunting players while pursuing them
AD_CambionTaunt_002.how_to_trigger: Start helm combat in TUT_Avernus_C, have it take enough time to get backup cambions to come, wait for them taking a turn.

AD_CambionTaunt_001.synopsis: Combat AD for backup cambion taunting players while pursuing them
AD_CambionTaunt_001.how_to_trigger: Start helm combat in TUT_Avernus_C, have it take enough time to get backup cambions to come, wait for their turn.

AD_DevilAfterDeadMindFlayer.synopsis: Combat AD for Commander Zhaik when the mind flayer is killed, showing how he is now focusing his attention on the players
AD_DevilAfterDeadMindFlayer.how_to_trigger: Start helm combat in TUT_Avernus_C, kill mind flayer confronting Commander Zhaik.

AD_CreatureCantUseTransponder.synopsis: One liner narrator AD that gets trigger when a summon or Us is used to interact with the transponder. Doing so does nothing, while interacting with Avatars and Companions will start the scene that will transition into act 1, so it needs to be clear that the transponder has been interacted with the wrong creature.
AD_CreatureCantUseTransponder.how_to_trigger: 1) Start TUT_Avernus_C2) Recruit Us by calling oe TUT_Laboratory_FreeUs in ReCon3) Teleport to -82; 18; -388 and interact with the transponder with Us

AD_LaezelRemindsNerves.synopsis: Cambion and mind flayer dies, Lae'zel reminds us about the nerves.

MindflayerCall.synopsis: The mind flayer in control of the nautiloid reaches out to the player, commanding them to restart the engine so the ship can escape Avernus. If the gith guide is present, the mind flayer will try to control the gith in the fight against the devils.
MindflayerCall.how_to_trigger: load Tutorial levelgoto -17, -389walk through doorscinematic triggers automatically

AltGuide_BeforeHelm.synopsis: Lae'zel's gith ally in the tutorial warns you that you have reached the helm.

AD_GreaterDevil.synopsis: Devil commander who continues to command/intimidate his troops in the battle against the mindflayer.

AD_ShadowheartRemindsNerves.synopsis: As the player nears their final objective to escape the Nautiloid in the tutorial, Shadowheart calls out what they have to do - a transponder that needs to be reconnected at the front of the ship's helm

PAD_MindflayerBetrayal.synopsis: PAD oneliner for when all devils are killed in the helm combat, making the mindflayer switch sides and become hostile to players, saying that 'they are no longer required'. If this happened it means players focused on killing devils instead of interacting with the transponder like the mindflayer told them to.This line reacts to this event, giving a bit of explanation to players to the fact that the mindflayer is no longer an ally and that running to the transponder is their course of action.
PAD_MindflayerBetrayal.how_to_trigger: 1) Start TUT_Avernus_C and teleport to -13; 18; -3892)Interact with the helm door, after the dialog combat will start3)Kill all enemies, leaving players with ally mindflayer, who will then turn on players4) Line should play on next player turn

AD_BackUpCambion.synopsis: Spoken by one of a  number of cambion reinforcements who storm the bridge of a nautiloid during a battle aboard the ship. Shouted battle orders to make haste. (note - this line is shared by a speaker group, though all possible speakers are male cambions - very minor characters only seen here in battle and never again).

PAD_LastWarning.synopsis: On round 5 of the final tutorial fight at the helm, the player will warn that the ship is about to crash and kill everyone.

DragonAppears.synopsis: Cinematic of the dragon appearing when getting close to the nerves. Invisible helper used so we can still play the cinematic in case Laezel and the mind flayer are dead.

PAD_NervesReminder_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NervesReminder_0.text: Damn these imps - I need to reach the transponder.

AD_GuideWarningBacktrack_0.speaker: Losiir
AD_GuideWarningBacktrack_0.text: Where are you going?! We must reach the transponder - now!

AD_LaezelMindflayerFall_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelMindflayerFall_0.text: The ghaik has fallen. Once we escape, we are free.

PAD_PlayerOutsideHelm_0.speaker: Player
PAD_PlayerOutsideHelm_0.text: Ship's going to buckle. I need to get to the helm.

AD_LaezelIgnoreCambion_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelIgnoreCambion_0.text: Ignore the devil! We must take the transponder.

PAD_FirstWarning_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FirstWarning_0.text: We need to get out of here - now.

Transponder_2.speaker: Narrator
Transponder_2.text: *The helm's alien transponder - you've made it in time.*
Transponder_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the transponder itself, a series of nerves waiting to be connected.

Transponder_3.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Player] connects control ganglion
Dragon presses up against nautiloid windshield
[Player] reacts to dragon pressing against windshield
Dragon breaths fire into pilot chamber
[Player] Reacts to dragon fire in pilot chamber
Connected control ganglions beging to vibrate out of the control
Connected control ganglions vibration idle lvl1
Dragon snaps at player
[Player] reacts to dragon snap

Transponder_1.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Player] looks up to see the new plane the nautiloid has shifted to
Connected control ganglions vibration idle lvl2
[Player] tumbles further aft from planeshift
Debris tumbles further aft from planeshift
[Player] tumbles fore from planeshift
Debris tumbles further fore from planeshift

Transponder_4.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Player] catches themselves on control console
[Player] reaches control ganglions
Control Ganglions stop

AD_MindFlayerIgnoreCambion_0.speaker: Mind Flayer
AD_MindFlayerIgnoreCambion_0.text: Leave him to me. Connect the transponder!

AD_AmbushDevil_0.speaker: 5e0dd3f6-ca0f-4acb-ae0a-076afb1fe907
AD_AmbushDevil_0.context: NodeContext: vee-KAX-oh-GAH. Battle cry shouted to lead a bunch of imps to attack a mindflayer

AD_ShadowheartGoToHelmReminder_0.speaker: Shadowheart
AD_ShadowheartGoToHelmReminder_0.text: Wrong way - we need to get up front!
AD_ShadowheartGoToHelmReminder_0.context: NodeContext: urgent - they're in a race against time and the player's going backwards

LaezelBeforeHelm_4.speaker: Shadowheart
LaezelBeforeHelm_4.text: Who put you in charge? I'll trust my own judgement.
LaezelBeforeHelm_4.context: NodeContext: Terse. Not liking being ordered around by Lae'zel.

LaezelBeforeHelm_2.speaker: Lae'zel
LaezelBeforeHelm_2.context: NodeContext: CANE-yahnk. Gith curse word, delivered with irritation after Shadowheart pushes back on Lae'zel's authority

LaezelBeforeHelm_5.speaker: Lae'zel
LaezelBeforeHelm_5.text: We are nearing the helm. Once inside, do as I say.

PAD_MindFlayerFall_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MindFlayerFall_0.text: Mind flayer's dead - the imps killed it.

AD_AltGuide_MindflayerFall_0.speaker: Losiir
AD_AltGuide_MindflayerFall_0.text: The ghaik is dead, praise Vlaakith.

AD_LaezelRemindsNerves_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelRemindsNerves_0.text: Forward, istik, before more dragons come!

MindflayerCall_11.speaker: Mind Flayer
MindflayerCall_11.context: InternalNodeContext: ~The player and Laezel walk into the Pilot Chamber to find a pitched battle playing out in front of them

MindflayerCall_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~A mind flayer extracts a cambion's brain before getting swarmed by imps

MindflayerCall_17.speaker: Mind Flayer
MindflayerCall_17.text: Thrall. Connect the nerves of the transponder. We must escape. Now.

MindflayerCall_16.speaker: Mind Flayer
MindflayerCall_16.text: You! Find a thrall. They must connect the nerves of the transponder. We must escape. Now.
MindflayerCall_16.context: NodeContext: Urgent and emotional, injured. To Us,, the intellect devourer.

MindflayerCall_3.speaker: Losiir
MindflayerCall_3.text: Do as it says - we will decide how to deal with the ghaik once we escape this place.

MindflayerCall_18.speaker: Lae'zel
MindflayerCall_18.text: Do it. We will deal with the ghaik after we escape.

MindflayerCall_9.speaker: Us
MindflayerCall_9.text: Connect the nerves! We will connect them!

AltGuide_BeforeHelm_0.speaker: Losiir
AltGuide_BeforeHelm_0.text: This is it - the helm. The ghaik who infected us will be inside. Do not not let it overcome you.

AD_GreaterDevil_0.speaker: Commander Zhalk
AD_GreaterDevil_0.text: Throw their corpses in the Styx!

AD_GreaterDevil_1.speaker: Commander Zhalk
AD_GreaterDevil_1.text: Split these intruders open! Avernus is ours.

AD_GreaterDevil_2.speaker: Commander Zhalk
AD_GreaterDevil_2.text: Kill them, or your spine is mine.

AD_GreaterDevil_3.speaker: Commander Zhalk
AD_GreaterDevil_3.text: Take this ship, or Zariel will have your head!

AD_ShadowheartRemindsNerves_0.speaker: Shadowheart
AD_ShadowheartRemindsNerves_0.text: Keep going! Get to the transponder!
AD_ShadowheartRemindsNerves_0.context: NodeContext: Urgent - one last effort so they can escape the crashing nautiloid

PAD_MindflayerBetrayal_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MindflayerBetrayal_0.text: That thing's focused on us now! Let's get to the transponder and get out of here.

AD_BackUpCambion_0.speaker: Cambion, Cambion
AD_BackUpCambion_0.text: Stop the intruders! They must not escape!
AD_BackUpCambion_0.context: NodeContext: Urgently as the cambion joins battle with his comrades.

PAD_LastWarning_0.speaker: Player
PAD_LastWarning_0.text: If this ship hits the ground, we're dead!
